properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_BIRTH = ? AND EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_ID = ? AND EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , POINT , GRADE , ENT_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT p.mem_no, p.pay_card, p.pay_cardno, p.pay_code, p.pay_date FROM MEMBER M, PAYMENT P WHERE M.MEM_NO = P.MEM_NO AND M.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M, PAYMENT P, ORDER_LIST O, STORE S WHERE m.mem_no = p.mem_no AND p.pay_code = o.pay_code AND o.st_no = s.st_no AND M.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER A, INTEREST B, MOVIE C WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.M_CODE = C.M_CODE AND A.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER A, INTEREST B, MOVIE C WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.M_CODE = C.M_CODE AND A.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER A, POINT B WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND A.MEM_ID = ?
